author: rich
msg: - Fixed declarative validation (through annotations) to work against both v1.0 and v1.1 of Commons Validator.

- Created a BVT suite for running NetUI against Struts 1.1.  It's a large subset of the entire BVT suite, which is currently running against Struts 1.2.  To run it, do 'ant bvt.struts11' from netui/test/webapps/drt.
- Miscellaneous BVT fixes for Struts 1.1/1.2 compatibility.
- Deleted PageInputTest14, which was testing incorrect behavior.

author: kentam
msg: Fixed a problem where the generated control bean does not compile if a control method returns a primitive type.
In the generated bean class, a control method's return value needs to be passed to the postInvoke() method as an object.
This fix will ensure return values of a primitive type are wrapped in the corresponding wrapper class first.

author: dolander
msg: Add an generateScopeId boolean attribute to the ScriptContainer (and Html) tag.  This will generate
a unique new scope id so that all ids should be unique.
Added a test of the feature.

author: minfrin
msg: Revert the STARTTLS fixes from the v1.0.x tree
